<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Query inventory catalog items"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/inventory/items/query"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Queries inventory catalog items with advanced filtering, paging, and field projection options.

**Note**: This API is marked as deprecated (v1.0). Supports the `SupportsCustomFilters` attribute.

**Workflow**:
1. Use this endpoint to search the parts catalog
2. Filter by category, keyword, or custom facets
3. Results include category details and stock information
4. Use returned `InventoryItemId` values for stock operations

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Request options including filters, paging, and field projections.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request parameters for querying inventory catalog items. Extends standard paging and filtering options.","properties":{"Paging":{"type":"object","description":"Paging and sorting controls accepted by inventory queries.","properties":{"PageIndex":{"type":"integer","minimum":0,"description":"Zero-based index of the page to retrieve."},"PageSize":{"type":"integer","minimum":1,"description":"Maximum number of records to return per page."},"SortField":{"type":"string","description":"Inventory field to sort on, such as `Name` or `LocationId`."},"SortDirection":{"type":"string","enum":["Ascending","Descending"],"description":"Direction to sort results."}},"title":"InventoryPagingOptions"},"Filters":{"type":"array","items":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Generic filter used across inventory search operations.","properties":{"Facet":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the facet to filter on, such as `keyword`, `InventoryItemId`, or `LocationId`."},"Ids":{"type":"array","description":"Collection of UUIDs to match when filtering facets that accept identifiers.","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},"Values":{"type":"array","description":"Collection of raw values used when filtering keyword or text facets.","items":{"type":"string"}},"Value":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Single-value fallback used by certain legacy facets."}},"required":["Facet"],"title":"InventoryRequestFilter"},{"type":"object","properties":{"Facet":{"allOf":[{"type":"string","description":"Facet keys returned by the filter service for entity type `75a1a773-e4ac-46ab-9f53-d3f6c4aa073b`, which powers parts and consumables catalog searches in Incident IQ.
